lines: chags dang bral yang yid 'ong rgyan gyis spras
khro ba spangs kyang rno ba'i ral gri dang
rmongs pa spangs kyang da dung glegs bam bsnams
rgyal ba brnyes kyang gzhon nur gyur la 'dud
dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang
sku gsum ye shes dbyer med pa
rjes gnang dam pa stsal du gsol
zhes lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab
ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
kun rtog 'ching ba bcad pa bzhin
bu la ral gri 'di byin pas
kun rtog 'ching ba gcad par shog
ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
gnas lugs mngon du mdzad pa bzhin
bu la glegs bam 'di byin pas
gnas lugs mngon du 'gyur bar shog
